termList.TermDesc: Once a reputable poets society in Ragunna, consisting of three members: Faroll, Selena, and Rimbaud. They composed numerous anthems and poems glorifying the Sentinel and the Order, but were later accused of blasphemy by the Order and sent on a Pilgrim's Sail. They vanished thereafter without a trace...

A large cake dedicated to the 1st anniversary of the launch of the Second Coming of Solaris Beta, as well as the control hub for its simulator. When asked about the hub's cake-shaped design, lead designer Encore replied, "What's a birthday without cake! Happy Anniversary!"...
A virtual simulation game developed by the Pioneer Association. Despite many setbacks during development, thanks to Rover's trust and support, the game is steadily evolving towards its ideal form....

Officially known as "Remnant Cubes," these advanced artificial intelligences were created for the Second Coming of Solaris using Encore's abilities and Tethys's microprocessing support. Please note: Remnant Cubes are experimental simulations, automatically generated by the system. Their personalitie...

The Order's executive arm. Unlike Order Penitentiary, which trials the heretics and maintains faith, the Chamber of Discipline deals with secular cases, and enforces law and order, while also overseeing Ragunna's defenses against Tacet Discords. Its enforcers are often referred to as "Inquisitors."...

Sonoro Sphere is a space of dense Remnant Energy capable of preserving transdimensional information. In Huanglong culture, such ethereal realms—neither tangible nor illusory—are often referred to as "mirages."...
A signal transmission pathway. During its simulation, the Second Coming of Solaris briefly linked with the Tethys System, creating a temporary channel between them....
A mercenary group in the New Federation led by Calcharo....
An ancient epic poem of Rinascita. It pioneered blending various regional folkfore with the tales of the Sentinel, including the first accounts of the Carnevale's origins....
A shore where Rinascitan poets and musicians bury their retired instruments....

The autumn night's brightest constellation, shrouded in legends. A poet of Golden Anthem once wrote, "I am a night hawk of wings aflame, soaring towards the Celestial Steed, whose praises I sing and whose true form I behold." Such imagery always evokes Rinascita's Sentinel. But why soar towards it a...

Music is composed of frequency, as is everything. Thus, everything hums its own melody. Ciaccona's Forte allows her to perceive these melodies; by retuning them, she crafts a Sonoro Sphere in her hands where stories and memories carried in music replay themselves. The deeper her understanding of the...

- Alternative Basic Attack "Incarnation - Basic Attack" becomes available. Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes, dealing Spectro DMG

- Obtain Bravo when Normal Attacks hit the target.
- Obtain Bravo when Intro Skill hits the target.
- Obtain Bravo when Resonance Skill hits the target....

Brant gains additional ATK based on his Energy Regen: For every 1% of his Energy Regen over 150%, Brant gains additional 12 points of ATK, up to 1560....

- Basic Attack becomes Basic Attack Phantom Sting. Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG. Can be cast in mid-air. When cast mid-air, Basic ...
Reduce the target's movement speed for 6.5s. When the target takes damage, Jolt is triggered once, removing Hazy Dream to deal Havoc DMG, considered Basic A...

Rover can hold up to 120 Windstrings.
Each stage of Mid-air Attack Cloudburst Dance restores 25 Windstrings on hit.
Casting Intro Skill restores 20 Windstrings.
Hitting a target with ...
ATK of the Resonators who pick up Euphonia is increased by 15% for 20s....

In the Striding Lion state:
- Attacks can be launched in mid-air. If Lingyang is on the ground, use Heavy Attack Glorious Plunge to get back in the air.
- Lion's Spirit is continuously c...

Up to 2 Ensemble Sylphs may exist simultaneously.
If Ciaccona's Basic Attack Stage 4 is interrupted, the Ensemble Sylphs generated will finish the action for Ciaccona and send Ciaccona into...
When Ciaccona or Ensemble Sylph performs Solo Concert, they give 24% Aero DMG Bonus to all nearby Resonators in the team. This effect is not stackable....

Ciaccona can hold up to 3 segments of Musical Essence.
Casting Basic Attack Stage 4 and Intro Skill recovers 1 segment of Musical Essence....
When the Vibration Strength is depleted, the enemy is Immobilized and cannot take any action for a period of time....

Zani can hold up to 100 Redundant Energy.
Obtain Redundant Energy when Normal Attacks hit a target.
Obtain Redundant Energy when Intro Skill Immediate Execution hits a target.
Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Resonance Skill
Casting Resonance Liberation Rekindle sends Zani into Infernal Mode....

Blaze is capped at 100 when not in Inferno Mode.
Blaze is capped at 150 in Inferno Mode.
Casting Resonance Skill Crisis Response Protocol

When Zani is in the team and a nearby Resonator inflicts Spectro Frazzle upon a target, immediately consume all Spectro Frazzle stacks and trigger the corresponding DMG, then convert Spectro Frazzle into equal stacks of Heliacal Ember. Every time...

Developed by Dr. Scott Rabelle, this method was originally designed to examine Resonators. It is also known as "Rabelle's Test."
Known for its safety, reliability, and ease of use, the test has since been adopted across multiple regions....
A Resonator born with innate Forte....
A Resonator who awakened their Forte through a life-changing event....
A Resonator who naturally awakened their Forte during their growth....
A Resonator whose latent Forte was prematurely awakened via controlled artificial stimulation....

A mark found either on a Resonator's skin or the ground of a Tacet Field.
For Resonators, these marks serve as conduits for their Forte, a sign of their rebirth after awakening.
In Tacet Fields, the mark becomes the focal point where chaotic energy coalesces, forming the white Resonance Cord t...

Overuse of power or obsession can overload a Resonator's mind and Forte, leading to Overclocking.
While Overclocking can be controlled, there is currently no known permanent cure....

Threnodians are formidable creatures born from the Laments, with the power to destroy human spirit and feed off of their collapsed will. If civilizations represent mankind's collective will, the Threnodians embody our fears and struggles. They manifest as destructive Tacet Discord disasters spreadin...

The term "Lament" refers to the ongoing catastrophic events on Solaris-3. Since the onset of the first Lament, the cycle of destruction has persisted relentlessly. The tide of devastation remains ceaseless, with no signs of stopping....
A form of pure energy with complete frequencies. The information it carries transcends time and space, enduring in a stable, unchanging state....
Transdimensional spaces where Remnant Energy is abundant are known as the Sonoro Spheres....

The "Tacet Fields" are thought to be where all Tacet Discords originate. These locations feature a sky of inverted seas and a deep cross-shaped Tacet Mark on the ground. Reverberations fill the air, linking our world to an unknown space through a white Resonance Cord. These areas attract gatherings ...

SOL-3, the third planet from the sun. A world of chaos and change, where old conventions are discarded and disasters run rampant. Human civilization struggles to survive in this new era of destruction and rebirth, facing uncharted challenges with unwavering determination....

The Lament's power causes destructive waves across the land of Solaris. Manifestations like the "Tacet Fields," "Tacet Discord Outbreaks," and the enigmatic "Tacetite" are part of what is collectively known as the "Waveworn Phenomena."...

Tacet Discords, beings created by the Waveworn Phenomena bearing "Tacet Cores", are dangerous entities with ever-changing, amorphous forms, which feed on other frequencies to maintain stability and evolution. These creatures mimic their prey's abilities, shapes, and behaviors, influenced by the type...

A type of special frequency that can be captured by the Terminal to reproduce Tacet Discords' abilities.
There's a chance for Tacet Discords to leave behind "Reverberations" when they are eliminated, which can then be transformed into "Echoes" through the Terminal's Data Bank, providing a useful ...

Wherever there is civilization and history, there will be Sentinels. They serve as mankind's guardians and conductors. Their immortal existence has helped humanity through countless troubles, sharing wisdom and prophecies. As humanity embarks on a new journey after enduring the Lament, the Sentinels...
The Magistrate is a governing official who oversees one of the major regions within Huanglong....

The Ministry of Development serves as the engineering and construction arm of the Central Office of State Affairs.
It is comprised of three key divisions: the Ordnance and Defense Divisions, which handle all military applications. And the Infrastructure Division, tasked with public works and cons...

The Midnight Rangers are a military force under the Jinzhou Ministry of War, commanded by General Jiyan. They consist of three divisions: Outriders (reconnaissance), Vanguard (offensive operations), and Rearguard (defensive operations)....
Public Security Bureau staff who are responsible for the security issues of their jurisdictions....
The local law enforcement arm of the Justice Commission. Operating through Patrol Stations, it maintains civil order and handles public security matters. Its officers are known as "Patrollers."...
The local enforcement unit of the Public Security Bureau that handles routine security operations and maintains public order....

Lollo Logistics is a trusted logistics company that delivers not only the tangible, but also the intangible.
Whether it's sending sweet words to a loved one or retrieving lost memories, if it's ordered and can be delivered, Lollo Logistics will handle them with care....

Jinzhou, a fortified city on the frontier, stands guard against the looming Tacet Discord crisis. As one of Huanglong's six major regions, it bears the weight of this responsibility as the youngest provincial capital. The Midnight Rangers defend its northern border without hesitation....
The state-run research institute of Huanglong, with branch organizations established in each city....
Located at the edge of the continent, this country borders the sea to the east. It boasts a vast territory with one capital and six major cities....

The most enduring and enigmatic family in Ragunna, the Fisalias are renowned for their expertise in medicine and poison crafting. Their unwavering devotion to the Sentinel is well-known among the citizens....

Nestled on the edge of a cliff in Thessalleo Fells, Porto Veno Castle is a mysterious and magnificent residence of the Fisalias.
Among all the Fisalia family properties across Rinacista, this imposing cliffside castle stands out as the most special. It is the home of the current head of the Fisal...

A nation of independent city-states scattered across a vast archipelago, with no central administrative center. It is also known as the "Land of Echoes," which boasts unique natural and cultural landscapes.
Legends speak of how Rinascita's founders fled their homelands and sailed to these islands...

One of the city-states in Rinascita, Ragunna is a thriving port city on the edge of the sea, its districts linked by winding waterways.
The Ragunnesi are devout followers of the Sentinel, who believe Common Echoes to be gifts from the Sentinel that carry Their divine will....
A two-tiered holy edifice in Ragunna City, devoted to the worship of the Sentinel's statue....

The de facto ruling authority of Ragunna that manages all city matters, from municipal policies and currency to civil disputes.
The head of the Order, known as the Primus, is currently Fenrico, who claims to be the Enlightened One—the Resonator of Rinascita's Sentinel Imperator.
According to c...
Religious people devoted themselves to the Order of the Deep....

One of the most powerful families in Ragunna, renowned for their pioneering spirit.
The Montelli family played an instrumental role in charting trade routes that not only connect Ragunna, but also greater Rinascita to the wider world. As the city opened its doors, the Montellis rose to prominence...

The Carnevale is the grandest celebration of Ragunna, a time with never-ending masquerades, wine flowing like rivers, and music pulsing through the night.
During this time, people cast aside the weight of the world and surrender to the wild, unrestrained joy of the festival....

At the peak of the Carnevale, the Sentinel is said to manifest and crown the finest performer with the "Laurel."
This honor grants the bearer the privilege to commune with the Sentinel and hear Their wisdom....

The universal currency issued by Huanglong, officially recognized across many regions.
In the ancient past, the ancestors of Huanglong utilized seashells as currency. Though the manufacturing techniques have evolved over time, the shell-like appearance of this currency has endured....
The Sentinel of Rinascita. Though worshipped as the Divinity by the Order of the Deep, Imperator rarely reveals Their presence to the public....
A colossal, whale-like Tacet Discord. Depite its gentle nature, its gargantuan size can inadvertently cause significant destruction....
A Montelli bank situated at the heart of the Ragunna City....

A troupe formed by exiles drifted to the Penitent's End on the Pilgrim's Sails for their supposed "transgressions."
To reveal the truth hidden by the Order, they wrote numerous plays and "danced in chains," performing tirelessly across the archipelago....

Solaris' foremost authority on observing the Lament cycle.
Through constant observation and analysis of Lament's shifting patterns, this organization predicts and warns of impending manifestations before they occur....

Also known as the Civilization Simulation Sand Table, the Tethys System is a supercomputer unique to the Black Shores. By inputting Lament frequency data—collected both manually and via beacon access—into the system, the Black Shores can issue Lament warnings for locations worldwide within a 24 to 4...

Modulation is the process of adjusting frequencies. In Solaris-3, frequencies serve as a crucial tool for uncovering the truth about reality. By altering these frequencies, one can delve into the very core of existence.
At the Black Shores, modulating Stellar Matrices is crucial for tracing and a...
Patrollers in Jinzhou....
A globally popular competitive sport that puts both the strength and endurance of its participants to the test....
A unique martial art practiced by Yuanwu, known for its heavy and fierce strikes. However, only those who temper their strength with precise control can wield it without breaking themselves....
Danjin's favorite dessert. It is considered a symbol of good luck and blessings because of its association with loong....

One of the Sentinels of Huanglong, taking the shape of a Loong. The guiding force behind Jinzhou's civilization.
A majestic "deity" with unquestionable power, omniscient of Jinzhou's past, present, and future. Jué, the wielder of time's flow, sees eons as mere moments. In an instant, Jué can chan...

A grand construction located in the central axis of Jinzhou. Not only it reserves the functions of important reception and discussion of major issues, but also sets itself as the symbol of hope for the people of Huanglong....

The head governor of Jinzhou.
In Huanglong, when a Magistrate takes office, they adopt the region's name as their own. For example, Jinhsi was originally named Hsi but changed her name to Jinhsi after becoming the Magistrate of Jinzhou....

Cantarella's Resonance ability of poison manipulation. It induces vivid hallucinations in its targets, whether manifestations of their deepest desires or carefully crafted illusions.
Like all Fisalia family's abilities, it comes at a price. Prolonged use risks trapping the wielder in their own dr...

A potion Cantarella developed in her girlhood through relentless experimentation.
While mildly toxic itself, the brew counteracts most poison reactions and induces deep relaxation. It even offers partial protection against Threnodian whispers.
However, those untrained in toxin tolerance may ex...

termList.TermTitle: The Other Side of the Dream
termList.TermDesc: The reality, as opposed to "this side of the dream."...
A strange being that resides within the Magic Box carried by Roccia. It appears to be born from the inspirations imbued in the collected objects inside the box....
A massive suitcase that never leaves Roccia's side, housing various stage props, play scripts, and Pero....
A dedicated protector of the Magistrate, also serving as their personal secretary....

Once a renowned Poets Society of Ragunna, its three members—Faroll, Selena, and Rimbaud—wrote many poems praising the Sentinel and the Order.
However, they were banished by the Order for blaspheme against the Divinity. Sent aboard a Pilgrim's Sail, they vanished without a trace, and their names w...

Rebuilt by Changli during her time serving in Huanglong's capital, this charity organization is directly managed by the Central Court. It provides shelter to refugees and orphans displaced by plagues, famines, and TD Outbreaks....
Changli's mentor, a revered hermit in Huanglong known for his knowledge of statecraft and diplomacy. He traveled widely to share his wisdom and knowledge....
The advisor of Jinzhou's Magistrate. The current Counselor taught Jinhsi the way of governing before she became the Magistrate....

The origin of the games stems from the unwavering faith and determination of the people of Jinzhou to overcome the Lament. What started as a small-scale event to celebrate the victory against the Tacet Discords has now evolved into a military-civilian athletic gathering, aimed at promoting physical ...

A traveling performance group specializing in the traditional Liondance. They take commissions from both the Jinzhou Theater and private clients to support themselves and cover their travel expenses....

Liondance is combination of martial arts and choreography that has now become a signature folk art in Jinzhou. It originated from traditional boxing and martial arts in Huanglong, emphasizing swift footwork and powerful postures....

This traditional performance takes many forms, from solo shows featuring only the Agile Head to a duo combining both the Agile Head and the Steady Tail.
Agile Head is a jargon for Lion Head....
This star-like flower represents love and courage. One day, these earthly stars will blanket every field....
A martial art embodying Taoist wisdom, where practitioners harmonize with nature's rhythms to develop balanced strength of body and mind....
The Averardo Bank run by the Montellis in the Ragunna City....

A popular name referring both to the abandoned underground waterway in Ragunna and the street gang that once operated there. Though the criminal organization was crushed by a mysterious vigilante years ago, rumors suggest they are creeping back from oblivion....

A catastrophe happened twenty years ago that not only destroyed the Avinoleum Theological Seminary but also wreaked havoc across Ragunna.
For the people of Ragunna, it was the sacrifice of Fleurdelys, the Blessed Maiden, who single-handedly halted the Second Dark Tide....

A decade ago, the Carnevale was attacked by a giant sea creature and plagued by TD outbreaks. Primus Fenrico intervened to end the chaos, but the event left new wounds for Ragunna City, which was still recovering from the Second Dark Tide....
The Midnight Rangers have three divisions: Outriders (reconnaissance), Vanguard (offensive operations), and Rearguard (defensive operations), all under the command of General Jiyan....
A Remnant Creature reminiscent of a white udumbara. It can communicate with Baizhi through telepathy....
A type of special Stellar Matrix used to contain the errors and discarded data of Tethys System....
A special expanse that collects all the dreams in Solaris since it came into being. It is managed by two Gatekeepers....

A special dimension dedicated to the mysterious film festival in the depths of Somnoire. Though isolated from the rest of Somnoire, it boasts the best equipment and environment for movie screenings....
An activity held in the depths of Somnoire. You've been invited to be a judge, but the identity of the host remains a complete mystery....
The Tacet Discords emerge from the frequencies of nightmares and negative emotions. They can often be found in Somnoire....
One of the administrators of Somnoire, tasked with deleting "useless data" within the realm, or so he says. However, he has his own opinions on what qualifies as "useless."...
One of the administrators of Somnoire, tasked with keeping the realm running smoothly, or so he says....
A hidden, inaccessible space deep within Somnoire, where countless collected dreams lie buried....
The largest and most influential Gladiator event in Septimont, as well as a key economic pillar of the city....
A majestic name for the city of Septimont, perched atop Capitoline Hill. Its people are renowned as master sculptors, skilled hunters, and awe-inspiring gladiators who celebrate heroism....
An energy drink endorsed by Lupa....
Leaders of Septimont's temple who can foretell fate. They listen to the strings of destiny at a personal cost and offer guidance to those who seek answers....
A play script given by Phrolova. Every actor has their assigned role, and all stories unfold exactly as written, unless......
One of the six major cities in Huanglong, renowned for its abundant waterways, thriving greenery, and enchanting landscapes. There, commerce and Taoism thrive and coexist in perfect harmony....
The current Ephor reformed the Great Agon into a two-on-two competition. Now, gladiators must find a trusted partner to win the championship together....
A popular tavern situated in the commoner neighborhood, famous for its signature drink "Solis." Gladiators often spar there, with the loser footing the bill....
The ruler of Septimont. Ephors wield absolute power, as only the strong are deemed worthy to lead....
In the tales of Huanglong, mirrors are said to reveal hidden truths. And this one appears to show things unseen......
One of the signs that heralds the coming of a Dark Tide. It's when countless Tacet Discords swarm beneath the Blightcloud, descending upon Septimont in waves of destruction....

The final resting place of Septimont's heroes and legendary gladiators. Stone monuments, shaped after each fallen hero's signature weapon, stand tall in tribute to ensure their names and deeds endure through the ages....
Scars of the Dark Tide's touch. It may appear as discoloration, calcification, or even coral-like growths, depending on what has been corrupted....

A premier forge of high-end weaponry and gear, partnered with numerous noble houses. Its premium pricing, bespoke designs, and elite craftsmanship make it the top choice for aristocrats outfitting their champions....
A chain of mountains marking Septimont's edge, severely corrupted by the Dark Tide. Only the most daring Gladiators venture here seeking to train in its harsh conditions....
Participants in Gladiator matches. They are renowned for their strength and battle prowess and driven by an unyielding thirst for victory and glory....
Septimont's signature sport, where Echoes battle beside Gladiators. Victory in the arena hinges on their cooperation....
An Echo formed from the Reverberation of a fallen hero, fused into his armor. It longs to relive the thrill of glorious battle....
Septimont's central city—home to Gryphon's Fortress and the stage of the Great Agon....

The Lioness of Glory, Arsinosa. Born of battle cries and laughter, fused into the stone form of a mighty half-human, half-lion Echo. Since her genesis, she has stood watch over the City of Septimont....

The House Lupa fights for. One of Septimont's founding bloodlines, House Silva's roots once ran deep in the city's spire of influence. But with the rise of the new Ephor, such past glories have begun to wane....

The governing body of Septimont, tasked with advising the Ephor and wielding authority in key administrative matters. It also exercises power over the appointment and dismissal of public officials....
An omen of the coming Dark Tide, one that has lingered over Septimont for years. The region it shrouds is known to Septimontians as the "hunting grounds."...

The port that connects Septimont to the outside world. Vessels laden with goods and fresh catch arrive by the hour, while visiting Gladiators and travelers make landfall here upon reaching Septimont....

When Zani is under the following states, hold Resonance Skill to enter Ready Stance.
- While not in the Inferno Mode and Redundant Ener...

Wolflame

Lupa can hold up to 100 points of Wolflame.
- Restore Wolflame when Normal Attacks hit the target.
- Restore Wolflame while casting Resonance Skill.
- Restore Wolflame while casting Resonance...

Wolfaith

Lupa can hold up to 2 points of Wolfaith.
Wolfaith lasts for 10s. The duration is reset when Wolfaith is restored. At the end of its duration, each remaining point of Wolfaith yields 50 points of W...

Pack Hunt

Resonators with Pack Hunt gain a 6% ATK increase, and 10% Fusion DMG Bonus when they attack Overlord Class or Calamity Class targets (Both are no...
Normal Attacks increase Wolflame Regen by 500% on hit. Cannot perform Resonance Skill Shewolf's Hunt and Resonance Skill Feral Fang in this state....

Resonance Liberation - Glory

Casting Resonance Liberation Fire-Kissed Glory grants Glory. Within 35s:...
When Conviction reaches 120 points, press Resonance Liberation to cast Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall....
Includes Spectro Frazzle, Havoc Bane, Fusion Burst, Glacio Chafe, Electro Flare and Aero Erosion....

When Fleurdelys has Heart of Virtue in Manifest:
- Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 4

When Fleurdelys has Mandate of Divinity in Manifest:
Aero Erosion DMG is Amplified by 50% and its d...

When Fleurdelys has Power of Discord in Manifest, gain the following effect:

Echoes with this Dream Attribute center around Gradation as their core ability. Certain Echoes will trigger Gradation once and obtain buffs after staying on the field for a set number of days...

Echoes with this Dream Attribute center around Devouring as their core ability. Certain Echoes grow stronger in the Dreamland by Devouring. When a powerful Echo absorbs another one, its Daily Coupon yield increases....

Echoes with this Dream Attribute can cause considerable alterations in the dream through Integration. When conditions are met, certain Echoes will merge with another Echo on the same row into a brand-new Echo and grant various buff effects....

Echoes with this Dream Attribute have no unique abilities and are suited for synergizing with Echoes with other Dream Attributes. These Echoes will automatically be added to Echo Recruitment after being unlocked....

Echoes with this Dream Attribute center around Devouring as their core ability. Certain Echoes grow stronger in the Dreamland by Devouring. When a powerful Echo absorbs a weaker one, its Daily Coupon yield increases....

Echoes with this Dream Attribute center on Integration as their core ability. Some Echoes can reshape the Dreamland through Integration. When conditions are met, adjacent Echoes merge into a brand-new Echo and grant various buff effects....
Daily Coupon yield refers to the base quantity of Dreamland Coupons Echoes can collect per day....
Coupons collected by Echoes to meet revenue targets and keep the Dreamland stable....

The current Head Priestess of Septimont....

A scroll Lillibet carries, recording visions glimpsed in the flame light. Both this book and the murals within Tetragon Temple are media through which the Priestesses of Septimont convey prophecies to the people....
The legendary ruler of Septimont. The legend traces its roots to an ancient prophecy that only the one who becomes the Hero of Heroes can save Septimont from falling into ruin....
A secluded underwater experiment facility built by the Fractsidus and the Order, where they both pursue hidden ambitions under the guise of Common Echo reprocessing and production....

Phrolova's Sonoro Sphere, designed to replicate the Beyond through artificial means. Using the powers of Threnodian Leviathan, she intends to use bodies of Tacet Discords as hosts for the reverberating consciousness of the departed. In doing so, the Sonoro may merge with reality, and those long past...
A device for incubating Common Echoes. Twisted, shattered Echo frequencies are reconstructed into new Common Echoes within its chamber....

A Waveworn Phenomenon unique to Rinascita, the Dark Tide is a manifestation of the Threnodian Leviathan's power of Unity. Dark clouds amass overhead and crash down like a waterfall, surging in all directions. Wherever the Dark Tide spreads, it spawns Tacet Discords and scars the land with Tidal Blig...

High-density Remnant Energy from the Etheric Sea that projects past events with uncanny fidelity. The Retroact Rain unfolds in three distinct phases: natural descent, near-ground suspension, and reverse flow....

Humans selected by the Threnodian Leviathan to spread its doctrine, and sow sorrow and despair among the masses. Influence appears to be a key factor in their selection. Marked by the Dark Tide's corruption, they wield fragments of Leviathan's power, such as summoning its creations....
A world built upon thousands of Reverberations. A domain of decaying frequencies. A place where Phrolova found rebirth, which has now become a part of her existence....
Lingering power of the Threnodian Leviathan. After escaping from Mya's broken form, it concealed itself within the Ragunna gemstone on her helmet....

The Sanguis Plateaus was once the Septimont frontline against the Dark Tide. Due to the region's unique landscape, Remnant energy gathers here in unusual density, along with a Blightcloud perpetually looming overhead, formed since the first Dark Tide. An operation conducted by Septimont's Gladiators to eliminate the Dark Tide and its creations within the Sanguis Plateaus.
The Plateaus' unique terrain allows Remnant Energy to accumulate, sustaining the lingering Blightcloud hanging over the area, a remnant of the first Dark Tide outbreak in Rin...
A type of Tacet Discord born from the Dark Tide....

A colossal wedge-shaped structure located in the lower levels of the Sanguis Plateaus. It descended from the high heavens alongside Rinascita's Sentinel Imperator, who had full control over it. When the first Dark Tide outbreak struck Rinascita, the Earthrend Wedge was activated. Its energy field ef...
Located on the outskirts of the city of Septimont, it's the "air terminal" where Gladiators cross the canyons and make their trip to and from the Sanguis Plateaus....
The living quarters of Priestesses, where fate is observed and prophecies are documented. Commonly referred to as the "Temple."...
The main hunting ground on the mid to upper levels of the Sanguis Plateaus, where generations of Septimontians battled the Dark Tide and its creations....
A Common Echo in the form of a large horn. Hornett's high-pitched and lengthy blare is used to signal the beginning or the conclusion of large-scale hunting operations....
The mainland of Septimont and the Sanguis Plateaus are separated by a narrow and long waterway....

A unique flame produced by igniting specific minerals. Its appearance resembles sunlight more than ordinary fire. The precise types and proportions of minerals used to create this flame are a closely guarded secret, passed down exclusively through generations of Priestesses.

The ruins of a bygone civilization, said to be hidden deep beneath the Sanguis Plateaus. Its entrance is located in the Wastelands. Long ago, it was visited by the three Heroes of Heroes from Septimont.

A medal bestowed by the rulers of Septimont exclusively to Gladiators who demonstrate exceptional performance in the hunt against the Dark Tide. It is regarded as one of the highest honors among Gladiators....

Native to the Septimont region, Griffrexes once coexisted with the ancestors of Septimont who sought refuge in Rinascita.

A type of small device manufactured with Tacetite formed around the Earthrend Wedge. It provides energy to Anchor Obelisks, which in turn amplify its frequency to repel the Dark Tide and its creations.

An installation that can be field-deployed to amplify the frequency produced by Anchor Stones. Once the Anchor Stone is inserted, it can generate an energy field to repel the Dark Tide and its creations.

A field nestled deep within Maroonwood. At an elevation approaching Earthrend Wedge and situated in the lower middle level of the Sanguis Plateaus, it serves as the primary battleground where Gladiators engage in deadly combat with the Dark Tide and its creatures....
A lost Gladiator town located in the Wastelands at lower levels of the Sanguis Plateaus....
The term referring to the lower levels of the Sanguis Plateaus corrupted by the Dark Tide. This desolate region is marked by hostile conditions and is largely devoid of human activity....

A legendary plant said to grow in Manes Deep. It can survive for years in environments tainted by the Dark Tide, giving it a natural resistance to corruption. When used in medicine, it can slow the Dark Tide's corruption effect on the human body and help restore consciousness....

Victims of Dark Tide corruption who have lost all self-awareness. Their bodies usually resemble stone statues while retaining their original size. Such individuals constantly murmur and recite incomprehensible words and "hymns praising the Dark Tide." The voices from the Hollow Figures have been con...

Objects that look like giant stone statues. They are often found near heavily traveled routes or high vantage points, serving as navigational markers for passersby. A civilization located at the polar region of Solaris. Ancient shifts in the planetary axis redefined the world's geography, turning the Lahai-Roi region into what is now the planet's pole. Over time, the vast caverns deep beneath thick layers of ice and snow gradually became habitable for humankind...

A Tidespawn created by Leviathan. It is a fusion of the frequencies of three powerful Tacet Discords: the great lion "Nemea," the ancestral goat "Pan," and the slippery serpent "Python." Once Leviathan's "first offspring," it now "resides" within Galbrena after merging with her frequency.

A radio communication tower situated in the center of Honami City and the tallest building in the city. It was once Honami's most famous tourist attraction and landmark. It is said that the Lament that destroyed this city started from Neon Tower....
